sapaya paladunna eeta passe ballonge samahan wima elipahaliye siduwuna,kochchara wunath ballo me gana hitiye dasa wililajjawenuyi.kattiyama ekathuwela me gana kathikakarala thama balu parapurata karana laddawu sapaya ayin karawa gannata pethsamak oppu karannata thiranaya kala.pethsama liyala ehema kattiyama ekathuwela piliganwannata yanawa.pethsama geniyanne kate thiyagenayi ehema geniyaddi galana dadiyen pethsama ponganawa(ballanta dahadiya galanne diwen kiyala kawuruth dannawane)me wadeta prathikarmayak hoyapu ballo pethsama rawun karala ekekuge pashchath bhagayata athulkala bolata apata therena basawen kiwwoth rol karala puke gahuwa.anthimata pethsama baradena welawa aawahama pethsama kage puke gahawwada kiyala ballanta hoyaganna bariwuna.ethanadi pethsama hoyagannata ballo hama ekama anikage pashchath bhagaya iwakara bala bala giya ee purudda thamayi ballanta oya adatath thiyenne.

mulinma..subha pathum..!ee lagata..bohoma santhoshayi nage...blog eka gana wagema ara hora wadawalatath..eewath ithin kerenta epayi.balagena giyahama man giya parawalwalamane me hawith gihin thiyenne...math ithin oya sakunthala lamayage saha ara prawin indaranama kiyana goyiyage lipi haraha bohoma dewal igena gena yanthan me blog katuwa ato gaththe..oya kiwwath wage math wardpres paththe hakkalan koranta gehun ana gaththa newa...ee lagata duka..habayi ethanadi podi wenasak thiye.."epa hiru payanna adin pasu mage lowata" kiyanne mata blog liyanna aasawak athi karawapu saha mama aasawenma kiyawapu adatath dukage lipiyak enakal balan inna tharamata mawa pathkarawapu lipi malawa..onna ohoma ekama pare aawata...umbae eeta wada loku wenasak thiyenawa..api liyanna mahansi weddi..umbaa kiyawanna mahansi wenawa eeta wada..man hithanne man danna kiyana kisima blog ekaka..(deshapalana eewaye ara) me api wage pisso liyana hama adawiyakama umbae kament ekak nathi blog rachakayek hoya ganna nathi tharan...mama ehema blog liwillata wada anunwa dirimath karanna wehesena kihipadenayi dakala thiyenne..ee atharinuth umbaa dan hugak kalayaka indala ee de adatath karagena enawa..aththatama mama hugak nagata garu karanne anna eekata..ha ha meka athule mamath post liyanna oona nahane..onna man nawathrana..nagata jayen jayama wewa..!(maithri kirima itha wadagath pin wathuni..eeth methanadi hara..)
